question: How to add courier partner preferences?
steps: From the Dashboard, click on the 'Settings' tab.
Under Settings, locate and click on the '3PL Preference Page' option.
Here, you can choose and set your preferred courier partners based on your shipping requirements.
outcome: Once set, your preferences will be used to prioritize courier partner selection during order creation.
note: You can update your preferences anytime based on service performance, coverage, or cost.
